name: Dark Reflection (Liminal Dreams Series)
description:
THIS IS THE FIRST GAME IN A SERIES CALLED THE "LIMINAL DREAMS SERIES", WICH HAS A HIDDEN STORY, AND EACH GAME IN THIS SERIES IS A PUZZLE PIECE TO UNDERSTANDING THAT STORY.

You play as Margarette, a young girl who woke up in the middle of a forest with no memory of what happened prior.

After walking for a while, she comes across a mansion deep in the woods and hopes to find help inside.

What will she discover in this mysterious mansion ?

Made with Wolf RPG Editor.

CONTROLS :

-Directional arrows to move around.

-0 & ESC to open inventory.
